name: Dreamhouse
description:
A procedural narrative staged within a couple's dream house. Wander through walls, ceilings and floors and watch fragments of live action video clips to discover the fate of their relationship. 

If you don't like the ending, play it again — every trip through the house produces a unique result.

(Developed in 48 hours for the 2018 Global Game Jam.)

Credits

Game Designer, Writer: Marcus Estes
Game Designer, Developer: Dominic Mandy
3D Artist: Michael Sabo
3D Artist: Seth Wilhoyt
3D Artist: Brian Davis
Art Director, Actor: Cecilia Warbington 
Music: Dorian Duvall, of Mirror Gazer
